Blog.post: urlLink that is my hand..and my friend took my hand and scribble stuff on it..that is her signature..Lin Lin..and the round thingY is a piggy..ehaheha...poor hand.. urlLink
urlLink heahehaeha....that is my drawing..nice??yeap..class was super bored!!so i took the liquid paper and start drawing a cow..pretty nice huh??not bad...not bad..heahehaeha.. urlLink

urlLink EEKKK!!!don't be afraid ppl..as u can see the black thingY is our economics and also commerce teacher..lol..ehaheaheaheh...so if we off the lights in class we can hardly see him..and guess wat..during this time the lights are still on!!.... urlLink
urlLink well at least we know inside the 4 of them...1 of them is having fun..ehaheha... urlLink
urlLink this guy is suffering coz one of them is pulling his ears tooooo hard...altho it's a lil bit blurr...but it'll do..ehaheah... urlLink
urlLink ehaheha..4 of them..heahe..and they have to do this punishment..hehehehe....funny like hell urlLink
urlLink heaheaheh...pitty them....punishment for not doing their economics homework..ehaheahe.. urlLink

urlLink Left: Wei Kit(aka.lembu)and me..well both of us was bored of that stupid debate..bleh..so we took pictures..and that face in the middel..all the way behind...he wasn't suppose to be in there..i wonder why is he in there..Ish~! well he is yih foong..ehaheah...also another bored guy who is looking for fun..eaehaeh.. urlLink
urlLink This is how the debate is like....bored huh??everyone is like sleeping...but they look like they r listening..ehaehah..bored shitz man... urlLink

urlLink this is a close up of the lizzard...i took this in the hall....during that time they were having debate....and i was super bored...so ehehheeh...this lil lizzard is my only thing to play with..=) urlLink
urlLink LLLLLLIIIIIIIIZZZZZAAAAARRRRRRDDDDD!!!!! urlLink

urlLink that is naim..i wonder why is he in the picture...this was suppose to be only the mini playground..ehahehaeh...well anyways it was raining that time...so i took this shot under the rain...and it actually looked pretty nice for a moment... urlLink

urlLink that is me..ugly huh...and that is teoh wei (aka. forest cat)i have no idea why do they call him that..this is us sitting down on the floor after our sports waiting for ppl to come out of the toilet..heahehaeha... urlLink
urlLink This is where all the guys meet with the VIP's and do their "IMPORTANT" bussiness..i even took my shower in the toilet after sports..cool eh..ehaheaheh...oh well.. urlLink
urlLink this is the ladies toilet..but dun worry that time there wasn't any girls in there neither was i trying to peep nto the toilet...ehaheahe... urlLink

urlLink We were suppose to have fire drill,and as u can see it's raining..so we have to stay in the building with the fire and burn down the the school together..wat a fire drill...heahehaeh.. urlLink
urlLink GUESS WHO!!!???that is how it looks like last friday on err...18/6 and it's 8.30 am for god sake!!! urlLink

urlLink that's ilyas..he took a 3 weeks holiday when we r only given 2 weeks of school holidays,he went for an opperation and so he didn't come..so this is his first week and also the last day of school for the week..and on that day we hardly study..he is nice..always trying to give motivation to other ppl ehahea..like me..thx man!! leng chai ar!!ehaehah... urlLink

urlLink Izuan and me..oh he is looking at some guy who was playing with his *koff koff* you know wat..he is nice..always molest me,very crappy as well..good boxer haeahea..look at the background,that is the hallway..creppy huh?looks like those ghostly scenes in the movies..heaheah..well that is how our hallway looks like.. urlLink
urlLink and this is how the weather is on a early morning on friday at 8.30 am..pretty dark tho..and also it's very windy..woohoo~~!!! ladies skirts r flying around.. urlLink

urlLink That is me and ajmal,a real funny guy,he's nice to chill with,u always sees him sleeping in class but his results are sky high..well as u can see it's pretty dark,well actually we took this picture at 8.30 am the sky was dark and this is how it looks like..gonna rain tho.. urlLink

urlLink heheaheaheah...must be wondering y i took this...this are the 8TV crew's shirt...cool..they really don't have any professional training coz they don't really know how to entertain people..ehaheaheaheha....naw...they are super friendly..you can just bully them...coz i did bully 1 of the crew..ehaheaheahe urlLink

urlLink ok,this is where the camera man shot me for like 1 min or more andi must talk loads of crap..and at the same time i took a wonderful picture..this is just wonderful..sweet memory..ehaheaheah..it's me..Malaysian Idol..yay~!! urlLink
urlLink This is my number,daMn i can't buy toto with this number..heaheahnice number tho...hehehehehe..... urlLink
urlLink This is the waiting room,after waiting outside in a line..u will still have to wait in the "Waiting Room"heahehaeha..alot of people heh.. urlLink

urlLink while i was waiting,i meet this great guy,he is really very friendly,his name is David..leng chai leh???well we both r in the same group,so we were chatting to each other from 10 am till 5 pm heahehaea...and he is daMn good at singing.. urlLink
urlLink look at all the poor people..haih..these are the future super star and they are sitting by the side..haih.. urlLink

urlLink hauUhjahaUahahAHAUAHAHhahauhaahUAHAhauHAHhaUAhHAuahAHAUhaHAAua..that's me with my lil green chair that i brought to Malaysian Idol,lucky thing i'm smart i'm sitting on a chair where else the others are either standing or sitting on the floor..ehaheahehaeah!!!the picture senget so sorry ok..hehe.. urlLink
urlLink This is a pretty long line..well they are all here for the Malaysian Idol audition,look at all the people..and it's still a super long line ahead of me.. urlLink

urlLink Marvin's Angels,Top left:Pei Huan(aka.biiiird),Koi Lin(aka.Lin Lin,not breast breast ;p)Bottom left:Ying Ying,AMY!!!(my best among all best best best best buddy!!)yeap..all 4 of them work for me..they don't really know how to save the world tho..but they do know how to demolish the world,amy was in bright PINK that night,really bright!!sad to say they are all taken,even tho they are not you won't even stand a chance..heaheaheh..they are my angels..each time i see amy's picture my nose will start bleeding..OMG!!it's bleeding now.. urlLink

urlLink Alright from left:yoon thean,yih foong,wei kit(aka.lembu)alrightall 3 of them are basketball players,they are way better than me,also another group of ppl which are super fun to hang out with,with them around you,you will be laughing like mad non-stop..hhm..looks like i'm the only pink one here..oh well..it'll do..heaheah!! urlLink

urlLink From left:Sara & Shakur.both of them are my buddies,you can talk crap to both of them and eventually they will talk crap back tou you as well..sara helped me in alot of things like problem,love life,etc etc..shakur the big guy..he's nice to hang out with..hahah!!can joke with him.they nice peeps..=) urlLink

urlLink These are the few ''cacated''children,as you can see From left:Chee lee(aka.chili),cha cha yun(aka.cacat yun),li yi(aka.flower horn - in chinese fa lo hon),elaine(aka.BB).Yes we all know that you all have used codomo lion,look at cacat yun.hahahah!!!and look at the fish..heaheaheh!!!laugh ur ass out ppl..cacat yun is trying to for advertise codomo lion..sad to say this is not the audition.. urlLink

urlLink OoooKKkkk...this is a long picture for you people out there lets have a short game..if you all can tell me which are the japanese and which are not the japanese i will give you all a dollar for each girl,so post ur answer at the chat box and write ur name..i'm not kidding *winks* urlLink

urlLink Introducing the new Marvin's Angels..hahaha..From Top Left:Mooi Yee(aka. ah moi),Yoke Ping(aka.Yoke Pong).Bottom Left:Ai Mun(aka.Leng Lui),Yoke Chin.Now Yoke ping and Chin are sisters twins,so yoke ping is the evili twin and yoke chin is the good twin,ai mun always sits next to me in moral classes,she is smart,pretty,funny and guess what guys??she is available!!Mooi yee the girl with dozens of ''husband''just playing around,she is a cute one..she is so small size..and her voice is at a high pitch..like a lil girl..hahah!! so they are my angels and they do not save the world..but they do save my homeworks..hahaha!!! urlLink

urlLink Japanese Chick peeps..yeap she is in one of our student exchange program and i tell you she is HHHOOOOTTT...she is cute! and the way she speaks english my god! pretty good but it's soo cute her name is aiko errm..she was in this student exchange for like 2-3 days in our school,but daMn check out her fineee body..cute with japanese kimono..and it's red..it makes everything more HHOOOTT!!!she is cute..come visit us again and i ''WILL"show you the real Malaysia..*winks* urlLink

urlLink Oh My GOD!!!!it's VODKA!!!!!!!my favourite!!!!!these r the 2 large bottels in my house..they taste so good..so every now and then i will take a sip..and after that i think it's not enough..so i take more and more and more...till my face goes red..and my mom ask ''why is ur face red?'' i'll just tell her that the weather is hot..and i start talking bull cock stories to everyone i see..but i know how to control ;p...i still remember what happen in Langakawi!!haehhaha.. urlLink

urlLink Great couples!wanna know y?both of them are almost the same size..small lil tiny couples,okok..the girl is yoke ping(aka.yoke pong)and her bf foond chuan,yeap they both are small i think she is like..4ft ok fine 5ft and the guy..just a wee bit taller..but they are cute,yoke pong is strong,she is small but fierce n strong..wow..dun play play urlLink

urlLink Ok!!this is me and Elaine(aka.Blur Blur)yeap we took this picture early morning still in the bus just playing around with a new digi cam,BB is a horrible girl don't look at her innocent face,when you actually get to know her she actually torture you..how horrible i was one of her victims >.

urlLink This is a nice view..very relaxing indeed,as you can see this is part of mother's nature..blah..it's just a garden outside of my house..haha..nothing great about it i think..but it looks pretty nice..=) urlLink

urlLink This is Amy Sun,i knew for about 6-7 years,she is pretty & cute,she is a taiwanese but staying in Malaysia somehow..currently she is studying in melb,miss her sooo much!!used to bully her like mad muahah..but now she's not around so i just bully her online..muhahah!!miss you alot!!oh ya..for the guys out there..you all are 1 step slower..she is taken..sorry guys.. =) urlLink

urlLink Perfect weather,it's a day where it's not too sunny,hot or rainny look at the nice blue sky..it's those days where you could walk around the park without swaeting or getting sun burnt lovely weather.. urlLink

urlLink The old wrinkles of Cameron Highland..eewww..hahah..naw..this is just the tea leafs field..''Betul Betul UMMM!!'' it's a nice cooling place to be..so those of you who love to go out and 'yum cha' go to Cameron they have great tea's hahahah!!all the way up to cameron..heaheha... urlLink

urlLink Nice drawing,this is done by one of my friends in s'pore she is a total anime girl,she finish this drawing in like 2 hours+ including clours,she calls herself akarui siren,she speaks jap really well..i haven't been talking to her for pretty long..miss her tho..love her drawings as well =) urlLink

urlLink This is Lynn,i know her throught friendster another magical webby,knew her for awhile,she's a funny girl,nice to chat with as well,currently she is in perth,but she was born in either s'pore,penang,or kl..either 1..hahaha..opps.. urlLink

urlLink Okie,this is susan,she's in perth now..cute huh??i knew her through a friend he intro me to her,knew her through this magical program as well called MSN cool huh..haha..she is a farnny girl..showing off her pretty teeth and her cute chubby cheeks..now i feel like pinching em.. urlLink
urlLink let me out!!let me out!!aawww...ain't this lil thingY cute??well we won't harm this lil dude,it's a dangerous world out there so we are keeping it till it's not so dangerous.. urlLink

urlLink this is CANDY!! *winks* she's pretty huh??well i knew her through this magical program called MSN how cool huh..she's a funny girl,still available as well if you peeps wanna know her hehehe..write down you comments and you know where to find for me..she is sooo ccuuttee!!! urlLink

urlLink From left:Adrian Ee.Liew Choon.Ruhullah.They look so dead,well they should be after 3 of them just raped a poor lil kid,adrian is feeling pretty guilty but the looks of liew choon and ruhullah they enjoyed it and they want more,as you can see liew choon is thinking who is the next target!! urlLink

urlLink that is me and adrian,both of us are trying to find out what is insude that big nose..*bleh*you don't wanna know..we found something sticky and slimy..but it feels pretty nice..that wonders why are we smiling.. =) urlLink

urlLink Josaphine(aka.Left Hand Shake,Jo Sau Fing)yeap..she's mean i tell you,she is my class teacher and also my science teacher,GOD!look at her!!she's always giving the looks that we have killed her family,but when she turn her back she will be laughing like mad..wanna be cool..but she's nice overall hahaha!!! urlLink
urlLink From left:Jane,Ilyas.yeap he's handsome cool down ladies,he's still available.Jane just pop up in the picture..just like that...wonder why?? urlLink
urlLink From left:Jean Hau(aka.N2),Evelyn.well this is my sister and her bf..hahah..must be wondering why i call him N2 put down your comments and i will tell you why.. urlLink
urlLink that is BB (Blur Blur) aka.Elaine,she was pretty high that night and i tell you all she is totally blurrr.... urlLink
urlLink this is me in the bus after a long day moving around,and that is my school uniform..yes i know..we look like McDonald's worker.. urlLink
alright..i'm pretty pissed off at this thing..it says that I can add pictures in this..I don't seems to see anything which allows me to add in pictures..ARGH!!

Hello cyber world,i'm new to this well my main purpose posting this blog out is to put out pictures of my friends,family,funny events,happening events,etc..etc that is pretty much I will start off with for now..thank you..hehe..

urlLink Everyone let me introduce u miss.Ilyas..he..i mean she..is a very cute girl..funny as well...very caring..well Miss.Ilyas likes girls..i mean guys..hehe..it's not a guy...it's a girl...look at the cute innocent face..pretty ain't it??she is the suitable girl for every guy..need further detail please contact me..thank you.. urlLink

urlLink well this was suppose to be a all girl picture....but somehow i just ran in n took the shot..muahahah...sorry girls...i ruine ur picture...but it's nice...hahaha....man..the girls are small size...heheh.. urlLink

urlLink heheh...this is me and afy..she is really a sweet girl..very open minded as well..sweet gurl..she actually tells u tips n tricks on how to go after girls..heheh..she told me alot..funny girl as well..nice to hang out with..love ya gurll..take care alright!!! urlLink

urlLink from left:ajmal,naim,izuan,me,and teoh wei..well as u can see...we r doing..hear no evil,talk no evil & see no evil..heaheha..that is just us...nothing better to do..well anyways we are all still evil..muaheahe...muahehaeha... urlLink

urlLink OK..i know it's weird of me tryin to kiss all my teachers..ehaheha..well i just love them..so the short one is yoke pong..eheheh..sorry ar..and u know la..the teacher is my class teacher..call her jojo..muahehahea... urlLink

urlLink this is us again..just the few of us and our new science teacher..her name is surely..we r her few science students coz we took up science in english..ehaheah...and that is me..trying to kiss her..muahehaeha..jhan at the side..posing..(the malay)teoh wei behind..asking for world peace..and leon just smiling like mad..ehaheha... urlLink

urlLink alright..as you all can see..this is our class picture..=) wellme right in the middel..hehehe...n the other girls around me..=)n the black shirt in the middel is our class teacher..well call her jojo..this is a fun picture..we all had fun and also enjoy taking this..ehaheaheah urlLink
sorry for not posting up anything for a long long time..well..i haven't got a digital camera yet...coz my sis took my digi cam...so I hope I can get a new 1 soon...sorry PPL!!! urlLink
urlLink aren't they lovely??well from left: Bernice & Beng Wee...ahahaha...they have known each other for like 3 years...and now they are together..heheh...cute huh?? urlLink

urlLink This is my sister(ka cheh)hahaha...name is evelyn..currently she is in Melb..she is suffering there..missing her alot as well..love my sis alot..she helps me in alot of things..crappy n funny gal as well..cracks me up when i'm down..love ya!!! *muacksZ!!* urlLink
urlLink This is my fren Bernice!!!she is sooooo cute.....aaahhh....i'm melting....she is nice,sweet,caring,funny,soft..she is just the one...eerr...i mean...the one in the picture..*winks!* urlLink
